mapper.select: SELECT b.* ,f.file_no AS file_no ,f.file_name ,f.file_path ,f.file_code FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM files WHERE parent_table = "board" AND file_code = 1 ) f ON (b.board_no = f.parent_no) ORDER BY b.board_reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, user_no, board_content) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{userNo}, #{boardContent} )
